value.title: Accelerating ATO in Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: While your cloud provider manages security OF the cloud, security IN the cloud is the responsibility of the customer. During this on-demand webinar, Microsoft Azureâ€™s Chief Information Security Officer for High Security Clouds, Mr. Richard Scher ...

value.title: Microsoft announces new Azure AI capabilities for apps, healthcare, and more
value.excerpt: The latest announcements will help companies enhance their voice-enabled application experiences and provide critical data management across healthcare industries.

images.title: Microsoft announces new Azure AI capabilities for apps, healthcare, and more

value.title: Azure Digital Twins enhanced features are now in preview
value.excerpt: Create new generation IoT connected solutions that model the real world

value.title: Distributed network name for SQL Server on Virtual Machines is now available
value.excerpt: Support for distributed network name (DNN) for SQL Server failover cluster instance (SQL FCI) on Azure IaaS with SQL Server 2019 CU2 and higher is now available.

value.title: Simplify and modernize your Java and Spring workloads with Azure Service Bus
value.excerpt: Seamlessly lift and shift your Java and Spring workloads to Azure while also modernizing your application stack to take full advantage of the benefits of cloud computing. Azure Service Bus Premium tier now has feature parity with Java Message Service 2.0 over Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (in preview).

value.title: Microsoft continues to build out its Azure Cognitive Services API family
value.excerpt: Microsoft is adding a new healthcare-focused text analytics interface to its family of AI programming interfaces, and it's making generally available Custom Commands and Form Recognizer APIs, as well.

images.title: Microsoft continues to build out its Azure Cognitive Services API family

value.title: Azure Load Balancer support for IP-based backend pool management is in preview
value.excerpt: Azure Load Balancer now supports adding and removing resources from a backend pool via an IPv4 or IPv6 addresses and virtual network ID. This will enable you to easily manage the containers, virtual machines, and virtual machine scale sets associated with their load balancer. It will also allow IP addresses

value.title: Hello, Azurebook: Why Microsoft's Windows future is Intel-free and cloudy
value.excerpt: The natural response to Apple's Arm migration is "What is Microsoft doing?"Â  Is the company similarly going to do a full port of Windows to Arm and work with the OEM ecosystem to make Arm PCs? Because Microsoft is a much more transparent company than Apple,

images.title: Hello, Azurebook: Why Microsoft's Windows future is Intel-free and cloudy

value.title: Top Cloud Data Warehouses for the Enterprise: Amazon vs. Azure vs. Google vs. Snowflake
value.excerpt: Modern cloud architectures combine three essentials: the power of data warehousing, flexibility of Big Data platforms, and elasticity of cloud at a fraction of the cost to traditional solution users.

images.title: Top Cloud Data Warehouses for the Enterprise: Amazon vs. Azure vs. Google vs. Snowflake

value.title: Build, distribute, and deploy application updates to Azure virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Azure continues to invest in new capabilities that make it easier to build and distribute application updates across distributed cloud environments.

images.title: Build, distribute, and deploy application updates to Azure virtual machine scale sets

value.title: Azure Firewall Manager is now generally available
value.excerpt: Azure Firewall Manager is now generally available, and includes Azure Firewall Policy, Azure Firewall in a Virtual WAN Hub (Secure Virtual Hub), and Hub Virtual Network.

value.title: Azure Active Directory B2C meter IDs will change on August 1, 2020
value.excerpt: Effective August 1, 2020, the meter IDs will change for Azure Active Directory B2C monthly active users.

value.title: Azure Storage 200 TB block blob size is now in preview
value.excerpt: Weâ€™ve increased the maximum size of a single blob in Azure Storage from 5 TB to 200 TB, now available in preview. The 200 TB blob size is available for preview in all Azure public regions with hot, cool, and premium tiers.

value.title: Commvault Announces Microsoft Azure Strategic Partnership
value.excerpt: Commvault has announced a multi-year agreement with Microsoft to integrate its Metallic Software-as-a-Service portfolio with Microsoft Azure.

images.title: Commvault Announces Microsoft Azure Strategic Partnership

value.title: New Azure Firewall features in Q2 CY2020
value.excerpt: We are pleased to announce several new Azure Firewall features that allow your organization to have more customization, improve security, and ease your management experience.

images.title: New Azure Firewall features in Q2 CY2020

value.title: Advancing Azure service quality with artificial intelligence: AIOps
value.excerpt: As Mark mentioned when he authored the Advancing Reliability blog series, building and operating a global cloud infrastructure at the scale of Azure is a complex task with hundreds of ever-evolving service components, spanning more than 160 datacenters and across more than 60 regions.

images.title: Advancing Azure service quality with artificial intelligence: AIOps

value.title: Azure Digital Twins: Powering the next generation of IoT connected solutions
value.excerpt: Last month at Microsoft Build 2020, we announced the new features for Azure Digital Twins, the IoT platform that enables the creation of next-generation IoT connected solutions that model the real world. Today, we are announcing that these updated capabilities are now available in preview.

images.title: Azure Digital Twins: Powering the next generation of IoT connected solutions

value.title: The next frontier in machine learning: driving responsible practices
value.excerpt: Organizations around the world are gearing up for a future powered by artificial intelligence (AI). From supply chain systems to genomics, and from predictive maintenance to autonomous systems, every aspect of the transformation is making use of AI.

images.title: The next frontier in machine learning: driving responsible practices

value.title: Azure Support API: Create and manage Azure support tickets programmatically
value.excerpt: Large enterprise customers running business-critical workloads on Azure manage thousands of subscriptions and use automation for deployment and management of their Azure resources.

images.title: Azure Support API: Create and manage Azure support tickets programmatically

value.title: Deploy to Azure Container Instances with Docker Desktop
value.excerpt: Today weâ€™re excited about the first release of the new Docker Desktop integration with Microsoft Azure.

images.title: Deploy to Azure Container Instances with Docker Desktop

value.title: Introducing Azure Load Balancer insights using Azure Monitor for Networks
value.excerpt: Azure Load Balancer customers now have instant access to a preconfigured solution for health monitoring and configuration analysis enabling rapid fault localization and informed design decisions.

images.title: Introducing Azure Load Balancer insights using Azure Monitor for Networks

value.title: Australian government to move to Azure-based records management
value.excerpt: Australian government entities will soon see records held in the cloud, thanks to an initiative led by the Digital Transformation Agency (DTA) to modernise digital records management in the public sector.

value.title: Azure Pipelines now supports Linux/ARM64
value.excerpt: Azure Pipelines now supports Linux/ARM64, as was highly requested by the community. Other key features to enhance the overall user experience are also now available.

value.title: Wildcard indexes in Azure Cosmos DB's API for MongoDB
value.excerpt: Wildcard indexes in the Azure Cosmos DB API for MongoDB, a popular MongoDB feature introduced in MongoDB version 4.2, are now available.

value.title: Case-insensitive string functions with Azure Cosmos DB now available
value.excerpt: Case-insensitive support in Azure Cosmos DB was released for the following string system functionsâ€”Contains, EndsWith, StringEquals, and StartsWith.

value.title: Azure SDK for embedded devices
value.excerpt: The new Azure Embedded C SDK is designed to allow small and embedded devices, such as IoT, to communicate with Azure services.

value.title: Create a formula in Azure DevTest Labs using a shared image gallery image
value.excerpt: Your customers can now create a formula in DevTest Labs using a shared image gallery image. Formulas provide a dynamic way to create virtual machines from the desired configuration and settings. Changes in the environment can be captured on the fly via artifacts.

value.title: Durable Functions now supports Python
value.excerpt: Durable Functions, an extension to Azure Functions used to define stateful serverless workflows, now supports Python. Developers and data scientists can now orchestrate complex data processing and data science workloads in Azure Functions using familiar Python language constructs.

value.title: Stay ahead of attacks with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Now more than ever, organizations need to reduce costs, keep up with compliance requirements, all while managing risks in this constantly evolving landscape.

value.title: How Azure.com operates on Azure part 2: Technology and architecture
value.excerpt: In part two of our two-part series we share our blueprint, so you can learn from our experience building a website on global scale and move forward with your own website transformation.

images.title: How Azure.com operates on Azure part 2: Technology and architecture
